description: Handcuffs made of seastone that can nullify Devil Fruit powers and weaken Devil Fruit users.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Captured with Seastone
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his Shooting Star Rush technique to fire seastone handcuffs at Caesar Clown, successfully capturing him and neutralizing his Gas-Gas Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Critical use of seastone to capture the primary antagonist of the Punk Hazard Arc.

abilities: Weakens Devil Fruit users on contact
Cannot be broken by most means
